glossary.introductionTitle: A new word in education platforms
glossary.introductionSubtitle: Meet our platform, that delivers pleasure from learning
glossary.platformCapabilityCommunicationDesc: Our platform support real-time communication between teachers and students
glossary.platformCapabilityAssessmentDesc: For student's knowledge assessment, teachers can create assignments and test suites
glossary.platformCapabilityExaminationDesc: A major part of materials can be examined online without the requirement to download it
